channel.title: ASF JIRA
channel.description: This file is an XML representation of an issue

item.title: [HBASE-15410] Utilize the max seek value when all Filters in MUST_PASS_ALL FilterList return SEEK_NEXT_USING_HINT
item.description:
As Preston mentioned in the comment in HBASE-15243:

https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/HBASE-15243?focusedCommentId=15143557&page=com.atlassian.jira.plugin.system.issuetabpanels:comment-tabpanel#comment-15143557

An optimization for filters returning a SEEK_NEXT_USING_HINT would be to seek to the highest hint (Any previous/lower row won't be accepted by the filter returning that seek).

This JIRA is to explore this potential optimization.
item.summary: Utilize the max seek value when all Filters in MUST_PASS_ALL FilterList return SEEK_NEXT_USING_HINT

status.description: A patch for this issue has been uploaded to JIRA by a contributor.

comments.comment:

Caused by: java.io.IOException: Call to /192.168.17.194:63852 failed on local exception: org.apache.hadoop.hbase.ipc.CallTimeoutException: callId=76, method=Scan, rpcTimeout=60000, param {scanner_id: 3 number_of_rows: 2147483647 close_scanner: false next_call_seq: 0 client_handles_partials: true client_handles_heartbeats: true track_scan_metrics: false renew: false}

	at org.apache.hadoop.hbase.ipc.AbstractRpcClient.wrapException(AbstractRpcClient.java:291)

	at org.apache.hadoop.hbase.ipc.AbstractRpcClient$BlockingRpcChannelImplementation.callBlockingMethod(AbstractRpcClient.java:331)

	at org.apache.hadoop.hbase.protobuf.generated.ClientProtos$ClientService$BlockingStub.scan(ClientProtos.java:33962)

	at org.apache.hadoop.hbase.client.ScannerCallable.call(ScannerCallable.java:220)

	at org.apache.hadoop.hbase.client.ScannerCallable.call(ScannerCallable.java:63)

	at org.apache.hadoop.hbase.client.RpcRetryingCallerImpl.callWithoutRetries(RpcRetryingCallerImpl.java:185)

	at org.apache.hadoop.hbase.client.ScannerCallableWithReplicas$RetryingRPC.call(ScannerCallableWithReplicas.java:360)

	at org.apache.hadoop.hbase.client.ScannerCallableWithReplicas$RetryingRPC.call(ScannerCallableWithReplicas.java:334)

	at org.apache.hadoop.hbase.client.RpcRetryingCallerImpl.callWithRetries(RpcRetryingCallerImpl.java:118)

	... 4 more

Caused by: org.apache.hadoop.hbase.ipc.CallTimeoutException: callId=76, method=Scan, rpcTimeout=60000, param {scanner_id: 3 number_of_rows: 2147483647 close_scanner: false next_call_seq: 0 client_handles_partials: true client_handles_heartbeats: true track_scan_metrics: false renew: false}

	at org.apache.hadoop.hbase.ipc.AsyncRpcClient.call(AsyncRpcClient.java:257)

	... 13 more

I did some testing against Ted's patch and was able to reproduce the error he mentioned above.

I think the error was due to FilterList being unable to reset the "seekHintFilter" set until nextRow() is called which effectively led the scan to a standstill if the max seek value returned points to the current row (i.e. column filter) which in turn caused the client timeout.

To fix the issue, I suggest we clear the "seekHintFilter" set before we further execute any logic defined in the fiterKeyValue method. Ted Yu, what do you think of this approach?

+1 overall
